sn36.24:1.1: “Pubbeva me, bhikkhave, sambodha anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato etadahosi:
sn36.24:1.2: ‘katama nu kho vedana, katamo vedanasamudayo, katama vedanasamudayagamini patipada, katamo vedananirodho, katama vedananirodhagamini patipada?
sn36.24:1.3: Ko vedanaya assado, ko adinavo, kim nissaranan’ti?
sn36.24:1.6: sukha vedana, dukkha vedana, adukkhamasukha vedana.
sn36.24:1.10: yo vedanaya chandaragavinayo chandaragappahanam. Idam vedanaya nissaranan’”ti.
